ai.title: AI Model
ai.noModels: No models available. Please check API key configuration.
ai.modelHint: Select AI model for conversations. Model list is dynamically loaded from API.
ai.advancedDescription: Background tasks (like importing artworks from web pages) can use a different model to balance cost and quality.
ai.usingMainModel: Currently using main model for background tasks
ai.backgroundModelHint: Claude Sonnet is recommended for structured data extraction. GPT-4o also works well. Smaller models may reduce costs but affect accuracy.

export.title: Data Export
export.jsonDescription: Export all data (artworks, editions, locations, history)
export.artworksCsvDescription: Export artwork info, can be opened in Excel
export.editionsCsvDescription: Export all editions with status info
export.exportHint: Regular JSON backups are recommended to prevent data loss
